message: has he supplied his taxes... No. Thus can we measure conflicts of interest accuretly... No. Do i need anyone to tell me that's screwed... No! Did he not include Twitter in today's meet.... No. Why? Cause Twitter went after hate and removed those accounts. Did he go after the union leader...yes... Did he lie about Boeing... Yes.... Did he violate standing USA policy in regards to china and Taiwan... Yes. Did he get building permits from Argentina after he mentioned them to Argentina president... Yes. Has he excluded reporters and newspapers...yes.... Did he chatize the CIA and thus men and women that put their lifes on the line....yes.... I can go on and on....I hear him. I don't tell myself like many trump supporters do...'he doesn't mean that' He is more than old enough to mean what he says so I take him at his word. I don't expect a 'presidential' behavior or attitude. He does not think that paying attention to security briefings daily worth his time. Excuse me! Do you realize that in August 2001 bush had a binder that told him of a high probability that we were going to be attacked with planes and he proceeded to spend 3 weeks at his ranch. So yeah... I am actually very informed, educated and capable of my conclusions. Yes he does have to prove things. He can't just spit out whatever he feels like... The well being of many are in jeopardy when he speaks BS. Or do you think the family of the union leader appreciated all the threats they received cause trump tweeted what he did. Do you see his tweets? I do. Mindless sponge... Girl... While SNL was still on the air he was on Twitter bitching. Media did not tell me... I saw it.
